backend/main.mo: Motoko actor implementing a horse racing betting backend with race logging, trust weight tracking per odds range, value bet detection based on odds and predicted probabilities, and ROI calculation across race history.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting three implemented features for redesigning the PredictionAndResults component with strategy mode display, best bet panel, and signal breakdown section.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend TypeScript/React files including components, hooks, utilities, and type definitions for the betting workflow application.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color system defining light and dark theme variables for racing-inspired UI with bold orange/gold accents.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the GTA Horse Betting Assistant application with root div and module script reference.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component wrapping BettingWorkflow with ThemeProvider, Layout, and Toaster for notifications.
Main workflow orchestrator managing three-tab navigation (Dashboard, Odds Entry, Prediction+Results) with phase state machine, handling odds data flow and automatic reset after result logging.
frontend/src/components/Dashboard.tsx: Primary dashboard screen displaying ROIDashboard performance metrics alongside instructional cards explaining the four-step betting workflow.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Application layout with racing-themed header featuring trophy icon and app title, plus footer with caffeine.ai attribution link.
frontend/src/components/OddsEntryForm.ts: Form component for entering six race odds (1-30) with strategy mode selection (Safe/Balanced/Value/Aggressive), featuring auto-focus, Enter-key navigation, implied probability calculations, and overround detection.
frontend/src/components/PredictionAndRes: Main component that displays value bet predictions using bucket-adjusted probabilities, shows signal breakdowns with hot/trap bucket indicators, handles winner selection, and logs race results with bet sizing recommendations.
frontend/src/components/ROIDashboard.tsx: Dashboard component displaying cumulative ROI, win rate, total races, and confidence-segmented statistics by odds bucket ranges (1-2, 3-5, 6-10, 11-30) with real-time updates via storage subscriptions.
frontend/src/components/WorkflowIndicato: Badge component showing current workflow phase (Entry/Predict/Log/Learn) with icons and progress indicator (1/4 through 4/4).
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages the backend actor with Internet Identity authentication, automatically invalidating dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBettingHistory.ts: Hook that loads betting history from AsyncStorage with real-time updates via storage change subscriptions, providing loading state and manual refresh capability.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout flow, identity persistence, and authentication status with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for backend operations including value bet calculation, race logging, race history retrieval, ROI fetching, and trust weight queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useRaceStorage.ts: Hook for logging race data to storage with automatic derived statistics rebuilding and storage change notifications, providing async operation state management.
frontend/src/hooks/useStorageRebuild.ts: React hook that provides manual data recovery functionality by rebuilding derived statistics from race records and notifying storage change listeners.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes, defining colors for UI components, charts, and sidebar elements using OKLCH color space.
frontend/src/lib/immutable.ts: Utility functions for enforcing runtime immutability through deep freezing objects and arrays, including validation and immutable copy creation.
frontend/src/lib/statsCalculator.ts: Pure functions for calculating betting statistics and odds bucket analytics from race records, implementing a four-bucket classification system (1-2, 3-5, 6-10, 11-30) with nine metrics per bucket including win rates, ROI, variance, and recent performance.
frontend/src/lib/storage.ts: AsyncStorage wrapper for browser localStorage providing typed read/write operations with error handling, immutable race record creation, and automatic calculation of derived statistics (betting history and odds bucket stats).
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility function combining clsx and tailwind-merge for conditional CSS class name composition.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query client and Internet Identity provider, then renders the root App component.
frontend/src/types/storage.ts: TypeScript type definitions for the complete data model including immutable race records, betting history, odds bucket statistics, model state with signal weights, and confidence-segmented performance metrics.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the default theme with custom colors using OKLCH color space, container settings, border radius variables, custom fonts (Inter and JetBrains Mono), and accordion animations.
project_state.json: Project state file tracking a GTA Online horse betting assistant with odds-anchored predictions, incremental learning, and a streamlined workflow (Enter Odds → Get Pick → Log Results → Learn → Reset). Documents 18 existing features including odds entry, prediction display, result logging, ROI dashboard, and UI/UX improvements with racing aesthetics.
